ygData.subject: A pod lands near the alliance base
ygData.msgSnippet: Life looked up to see a pod land near him. He hoped this could be his saveing grace. Seeing how the alliance base itself SEEMED TO BE IGNORING THE DYING BOT

Subject: A pod lands near the alliance base
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

 Life looked up to see a pod land near him. He hoped this could be his 
saveing grace. Seeing how the alliance base itself SEEMED TO BE IGNORING THE 
DYING BOT OUTSIDE THIER BASE!!!! HE SENT A DISTRESS SIGNAL TO IT.TELLING THE 
NEW BOT OF HIS SITUATION.
